Hello people of the world Turbofreak88884444 here with a challenge for you guys.

and yes this is another circle around kerbin but with a few twist you can only use hovers as your mode of trasportation (im my defination of hovers is a mix of plane and rover) with that in mind lets continue, and before you get nit picky with me on how your going to propell yourselfs around the world on hovers I got that coverd in the rules below.

Your mission: is to build and find the fastest and fuel efficnent route around kerbal weither it be by land or sea or the mix of both terrains. This is also a time attack run once you leave Ksp main facility your time starts. if time attack is not your fancy thats fine an alternate goal instead of a time attack run is to either carry passengers (or kerbals robots etc..) or Cargo with you untill you run out of gas...

Example of a hover AKA a  moded hovercraft--------\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/---------

Spoiler

 

       

 

------------------------------------RULES---------------------------------

Spoiler

 

1. no cheating like shift alt f12 hyperedit or any modded cheat equivilant.

2. you may use modded or stock AIR BREATHING ENGINES to your disposal and have up to 2 types of air breathing engines on said craft. you also must put 2 detachable solid rocket boosters on your craft incase of emergency like running out of liquid fuel.

  • 2b.No RAIPERS or other rocket engines allowed unless specified in rules.

3. minimum entry for tons is 25 you must Specify in your entry how many tons your carft weighs.

4. you cannot fly under any circumstances ie. ( forcing the craft to a continual increase in altitude)

  • 4a. On land if your going fast and all of a sudden you jump off a hill you may glide down or comensate for the landing

5. once your hover is completly built your next reqiarment is to put SAS units or rollers to the center of mass on both left and right sides Up to 10 units are allowed.

EXAMPLE:

Placement wise the sas units must be placed in this direction to comensate for the Picthing the nose or tail end. without these you would have a nasty suprise waiting for you...

6. Durring the cargo/passenger sinario try to have fun and or have an adventure and tell the story here

  • 6a During the time trail sinario tell a story on what problems you had to face and how you overcame them.

7. If your craft needs to refuel make sure that you have a landing gear or landing struts on your craft or have a binding to toggle the hovers on and off.

  • 7a. Flying refulers are permited to refuel the hovers when out of fuel.

8.  for modded entries you MUST use this mod here:

  • 8a. For stock entries Make sure you have your Air breathing engines thrust limiter enabled and comensating for weight loss when fuel is running low EX: max 75% to 25%

------------------------------------------------------OBJECTIVES-------------------------------------------------------------------

  • TIME TRAIL: Complete The Route in the fastest and fuel efficent time possible.
    • List and show on the map Where you needed to refuel
    • the less refuel points the better
    • Show off your FINAL TIME
  • EXPLORATION: Build a craft and tell a story on what you and your kerbals did
    • Show off your locations and where you stoped to refeul.
    • If your carrying cargo tell a story on where it needed to be droped off and where and what you had to do to get it there.
    • Show off your overall time and or completly show off XD

 

    •  

----------------------------------------------Scoring System (TIME TRAIL ONLY)------------------------------------------------

+ 00:00:20 seconds for fuel stops

- 00:00:01 Seconds for craft weight

- 00:00:10 seconds for overall top speed

+ 00:00:01 seconds for fuel capacity
